column4: Thanks for the help but I got confused. Well my display driver run smoothly in Ubuntu Jaunty & I could be able to change resolution that i want it (using Nvidia X Server Settings), but after restarting , it gets back to 1024x768. All i want is to keep stay in 1152x864. is there a way to do that
maybe take a look at the  xrandr   command
what are you trying to do?
